price: پاسني مخلوق ته غوږ نه شي اېښودلاى او له هرې خوا ويشتل كيږي.
arabic: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ وَيُقۡذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: lā yassammaʿūna ilā al-mala-i al-aʿlā wayuq'dhafūna min kulli jānibin
